summary: This is an email chain from Chris Dilorio dated April 25, 2019, alleging financial and political connections between Apollo Global Management, Jeffrey Epstein, and the Kushner family. It claims the SEC intentionally dropped an investigation into Apollo after the firm provided a loan to Kushner Companies and that Epstein's only SEC filing was connected to Leon Black's Apollo through a shell company called Environmental Solutions Worldwide.

keyFacts: The email alleges Jeffrey Epstein's only SEC filing was connected to Leon Black and Apollo Global Management through the shell company Environmental Solutions Worldwide Inc. (ESWW).
It claims the SEC dropped an investigation into Apollo Global Management a month after the firm gave Kushner Companies a $180 million loan, implying a corrupt quid pro quo.
The author asserts the OTC markets and 'dark companies' are used for abusive naked shorting and money laundering, with the SEC intentionally putting the public at risk.
Joshua Harris of Apollo met with Jared Kushner at the White House and was reportedly considered for a White House job.

The document connects several high-profile legal figures (Heiss, Gorelick, Mueller, Avakian) and law firms (O'Melveny, WilmerHale) to the broader narrative of regulatory enforcement and potential corruption.
